Description: Pick someone. They must swirl and sniff their drink dramatically before every sip, as if it's a potion, until they finish their can
When someone casts a spell on you, it bounces back and affects the caster instead. Works only once.
One person of your choosing must sing whenever they aren't drinking until they finish their can
Point at someone. They must do a party trick of their choice.
Make someone else use their staff as a witch's broom until they finish their can
Pick someone. They must narrate everyoneâ€™s actions dramatically until they finish their drink.
Using this wand (this card) grants you one re-casting of a spell you've already cast
Pick someone. Make a dunce cap for them. They must wear it until the next ceremony
Choose someone to answer 3 questions honestly or take a drink for every dodge.
Force someone to act as if they're from a different time period for the next 10 minutes or drink. Anachronistic language is encouraged.
Ask someone "truth or dare," and they must choose one. If they refuse, they take a drink.
When someone casts a spell on you, you may choose another player within sight for it to hit instead (not the caster).
Obtain a wand with a Dragon heartstring core (this card), making your spells more potent and formidable. (can affect 1 more person)
Pick two people. They must link arms until they both finish their drinks
Pick someone. They must grab you a drink of your specification (to the best of their ability, depending on availability)
Pick a player. For the next 15 minutes, they must act like an animal of your choice.
AI Prompt Adjustment: Make this one furry coded by inserting a cute anthropomorphic furry fox wizard character

Description: Pick someone. They must talk in a Boston accent until they finish their drink
Pick someone. Until they finish their drink, they can only drink when directly under light.
Pick someone. They can only say their own name and nothing else until they finish their drink
Pick someone. They can only talk in shakespearean language until they finish their drink
You may pick another wizard, they must flip their cloak over their head until they finish their next drink.
Create a 1-sentence binding pact with another player. If either of you breaks it, they must finish their drink on the spot.
column9: Draw a scene with two wizards making a serious pact together over a powerful magical spell book.

Description: Tell a joke, and everyone must laugh. Those who don't laugh take a drink.
Pick someone. Their next beverage is a can of tomato soup. It must go on their staff.
Possess the legendary Elder Wand (this card), which grants you a one-time casting of any spell of your level or lower of any class
Bring this to a party host to obtain a special rock, a stone, if you will. you can get stoned off of it (if you wish).
You must take this to a party host. We will give you a gun that allows you to instantly win a duel by shooting someone with a nerf gun. You may give it to someone else on your team.
AI Prompt Adjustment: Draw a normal looking person firing a glock at a wizard. Use a photorealistic style for the person and wizardly style for everything else.
